verses.verse: <S%G4012><s%> Now Concerning <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Collection <S%G3048><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Saints, <S%G40><s%> As <S%G5618><s%> I Directed <S%G1299><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Assemblies <S%G1577><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Galatia, <S%G1053><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Do. <S%G4160><s%>

<S%G2596><s%> <S%G1520><s%> Of The Week <S%G4521><s%> Each <S%G1538><s%> Of You <S%G5216><s%> ' By <S%G3844><s%> Him <S%G1438><s%> Let Put, <S%G5087><s%> Treasuring Up <S%G2343><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G5100><s%> Whatever <S%G302><s%> He May Be Prospered In, <S%G2137><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> I May Come <S%G2064><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> Collections <S%G3048><s%> There Should Be. <S%G1096><s%>

<S%G3752><s%> And When <S%G1161><s%> I Shall Have Arrived, <S%G3854><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Whomsoever <S%G1437><s%> Ye May Approve <S%G1381><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> Epistles <S%G1992><s%> These <S%G5128><s%> I Will Send <S%G3992><s%> To Carry <S%G667><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5485><s%> Your Bounty <S%G5216><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem : <S%G2419><s%>

<S%G1437><s%> And If <S%G1161><s%> It Be <S%G5600><s%> Suitable <S%G514><s%> <S%G3588><s%> For Me Also <S%G2504><s%> To Go, <S%G4198><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Me <S%G1698><s%> They Shall Go. <S%G4198><s%>

I Will Come <S%G2064><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> Macedonia <S%G3109><s%> I Shall Have Gone Through; <S%G1330><s%> <S%G3109><s%> For Macedonia <S%G1063><s%> I Do Go Through. <S%G1330><s%>

<S%G4314><s%> <S%G5209><s%> And With You <S%G1161><s%> It May Be <S%G5177><s%> I Shall Stay, <S%G3887><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> I Shall Winter, <S%G3914><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> May Set Forward <S%G4311><s%> <S%G3757><s%> Wheresoever <S%G1437><s%> I May Go. <S%G4198><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> <S%G2309><s%> For I Will Not <S%G1063><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Now <S%G737><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Passing <S%G3938><s%> To See, <S%G1492><s%> I Hope <S%G1679><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> A Time <S%G5550><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> To Remain <S%G1961><s%> With <S%G4314><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Permit. <S%G2010><s%>
<S%G1961><s%> But I Shall Remain <S%G1161><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Ephesus <S%G2181><s%> Till <S%G2193><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Pentecost. <S%G4005><s%>

<S%G2374><s%> For A Door <S%G1063><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> Has Been Opened <S%G455><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Efficient, <S%G1756><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Opposers <S%G480><s%> Are Many. <S%G4183><s%>

<S%G1437><s%> Now If <S%G1161><s%> Come <S%G2064><s%> Timothy, <S%G5095><s%> See <S%G991><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Without Fear <S%G870><s%> He May Be <S%G1096><s%> With <S%G4314><s%> You; <S%G5209><s%> <S%G3588><s%> For The <S%G1063><s%> Work <S%G2041><s%> Of The Lord <S%G2962><s%> He Works, <S%G2038><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> I. <S%G1473><s%>

Not <S%G3361><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Should Despise; <S%G1848><s%> <S%G4311><s%> But Set Forward <S%G1161><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Peace, <S%G1515><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He May Come <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Me; <S%G3165><s%> <S%G1551><s%> For I Await <S%G1063><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brethren. <S%G80><s%>

<S%G4012><s%> And Concerning <S%G1161><s%> Apollos <S%G625><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brother, <S%G80><s%> Much <S%G4183><s%> I Exhorted <S%G3870><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He Should Go <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brethren; <S%G80><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not At All <S%G3843><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Was His <S%G2258><s%> Will <S%G2307><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> He Should Come; <S%G2064><s%> <S%G2064><s%> But He Will Come <S%G1161><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> He Shall Have Opportunity. <S%G2119><s%>
Watch Ye; <S%G1127><s%> Stand Fast <S%G4739><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Faith, <S%G4102><s%> Quit Yourselves Like Men, <S%G407><s%> Be Strong. <S%G2901><s%>
All Things <S%G3956><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> Let Be Done. <S%G1096><s%>

<S%G3870><s%> But I Exhort <S%G1161><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> Ye Know <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3614><s%> Of Stephanas, <S%G4734><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> First Fruit <S%G536><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Achaia's, <S%G882><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Service <S%G1248><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Saints <S%G40><s%> They Appointed <S%G5021><s%> Themselves, <S%G1438><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Be Subject <S%G5293><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Such, <S%G5108><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Everyone <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Working With Us <S%G4903><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Labouring. <S%G2872><s%>

I Rejoice <S%G5463><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Coming <S%G3952><s%> Of Stephanas <S%G4734><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fortunatus <S%G5415><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Achaicus; <S%G883><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> Deficiency <S%G5303><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> Filled Up. <S%G378><s%>

They Refreshed <S%G373><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588><s%> My <S%G1699><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Yours; <S%G5216><s%> Recognize <S%G1921><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Such. <S%G5108><s%>

Salute <S%G782><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Assemblies <S%G1577><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Asia. <S%G773><s%> Salute <S%G782><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Much <S%G4183><s%> Aquila <S%G207><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> , Priscilla, <S%G4252><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> ' In <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3624><s%> Their House <S%G846><s%> Assembly. <S%G1577><s%>

Salute <S%G782><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> All. <S%G3956><s%> Salute Ye <S%G782><s%> One Another <S%G240><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> A Kiss <S%G5370><s%> Holy. <S%G40><s%>
The <S%G3588><s%> Salutation <S%G783><s%> <S%G3588><s%> By My Own <S%G1699><s%> Hand <S%G5495><s%> Of Paul. <S%G3972><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Love Not <S%G5368><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> , Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Let Him Be <S%G2277><s%> Accursed : <S%G331><s%> <S%G3134><s%> Maranatha. <S%G3134><s%>
The <S%G3588><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> ' Be With <S%G3326><s%> You. <S%G5216><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G26><s%> My Love <S%G3450><s%> Be With <S%G3326><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%> To The <S%G4314><s%> Corinthians <S%G2881><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> Written <S%G1125><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Philippi, <S%G5375><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Stephanas <S%G4734><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fortunatus <S%G5415><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Achaicus <S%G883><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Timothy. <S%G5095><s%>
